ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy crossbow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct heavy crossbows, capable of firing a projectile unstoppable by most man-made armors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval noble apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make noble apparel that brings a certain degree of authority to the wearer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plague mask
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make masks filled with herbal medicine to prevent wearers from catching plague and spreading the black plague.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healroot tree
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow healroot trees that yield medicine and emit antispetic smell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: meat smoking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smoke meat to preserve it for a long amount of time.
